nodes.text: The Kemix system was a star system located within the Yminis sector in the Outer Rim region of the galaxy. It contained at least three barren planets, including Kemix. It was marked on all Galactic navigational charts as being uninhabited and unremarkable. However, Kemix was occupied during the Clone Wars and became the site of a Glitterstim mining operation, ran by Riboga the Hutt. His ship, the Rightful Dominion also traveled to the system.
